pullRequest.title: [homekit] make security states configurable
pullRequest.bodyText:
currently, values of the security current and target states are hard-coded. it is not possible to customize them.
this PR make use of existing methods to add support for configurable values.
Signed-off-by: Eugen Freiter freiter@gmx.de

commit.message:
make security states configurable

Signed-off-by: Eugen Freiter <freiter@gmx.de>
